attributes.action: Increase income tax for those earning £150.000+
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to support the most deprived sections of our society more with improved benefits. These should help the elderly with winter fuel allowances, an EMA style system for students in further education and the mentally and physically disabled with more benefits to help them achieve a happy and fulfilling life. One way to help to do this is to increase income tax for every pound earned over £150,000.
